## Climate and Weather

::: columns
::: {.column width="50%"}
>Climate is the average weather conditions of a region over a long period of time, usually at least 30 years. 
Weather refers to short-term atmospheric conditions. Climate change refers to long-term changes.
:::

::: {.column width="50%"}
>Weather refers to short-term atmospheric conditions. Climate change refers to long-term changes.
:::
:::
